summary: Iteration 2 testing complete. CRITICAL FIX #1 (Contact page) verified successfully - react-input-mask removed, custom phone mask works. CRITICAL FIX #2 (Check Product Step 3) had a bug in handleNext logic - fixed by testing agent. Both critical issues now resolved. All features working correctly.

critical_bugs.issue: handleNext logic was incorrect - when step === 2, clicking Next incremented step to 3 without calling handleSubmit API. This caused blank Step 3 page.
critical_bugs.impact: Users could not see product check results - Step 3 displayed blank page
critical_bugs.fix_applied: Changed handleNext logic from 'if (step < 3) setStep(step+1)' to 'if (step === 1) setStep(2); else if (step === 2) handleSubmit();'

passed_tests: Contact page loads without crash (react-input-mask fix verified)
Phone mask custom implementation works correctly (+7 (912) 345-67-89 format)
Contact form displays all fields correctly
Check Product - Step 1 (category and subcategory selection)
Check Product - Step 2 (source and volume selection)
Check Product - Step 3 (result display with API data)
Check Product - Full end-to-end flow works
Home page loads with 4 action cards
Logo with dot displayed in header
No console errors on any page

critical_fixes_applied_by_testing_agent.issue: CheckProductPage handleNext logic bug - Step 3 was blank
critical_fixes_applied_by_testing_agent.fix_applied: Changed handleNext to call handleSubmit when step === 2, instead of just incrementing step to 3
critical_fixes_applied_by_testing_agent.verification: Tested and verified - Check Product flow now works end-to-end

verified_fixes_from_main_agent.verification: Contact page loads without crash, custom phone mask works correctly

verified_fixes_from_main_agent.issue: Check Product Step 3 result display - setStep(3) added
verified_fixes_from_main_agent.status: PARTIALLY WORKING - required additional fix in handleNext logic
verified_fixes_from_main_agent.verification: After fixing handleNext logic, Step 3 now displays results correctly

action_item_for_main_agent.no_further_action_required: All critical issues resolved. Application is fully functional.
